required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug-drug Interaction Study of Lanabecestat (LY3314814) in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of LY3314814 on the Pharmacokinetics of Dabigatran in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to learn about the effect of lanabecestat on how the body absorbs and processes dabigatran etexilate and how dabigatran etexilate affects lanabecestat when they are taken together. This study will last about 28 days and participants will be asked to take an lanabecestat tablet daily for 19 days and a dabigatran etexilate tablet on 3 occasions. Screening is required within 30 days prior to the start of the study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 36 hours postdose on Days 1, 16 and 20 of treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Area Under The Dabigatran Pharmacokinetic (PK) Concentration Versus Time Curve from Zero to Infinity (AUC[0-infinity)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 36 hours postdose on Days 1, 16 and 20 of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Lanabecestat Pharmacokinetic (PK) Concentration Versus Time Curve During One Dosing Interval (24 hours) (AUCtau)
Pharmacodynamics: Area Under the Effect Versus Time Curve (AUEC) of Thrombin Time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 36 hours postdose on Days 1, 16 and 20 of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics: Ratio of Maximum Effect to Baseline Effect (ERmax) of Thrombin Time
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through 36 hours postdose on Days 1, 16 and 20 of treatment

arm_group.description: Single dose of dabigatran etexilate administered orally.
Single dose of lanabecestat administered orally once daily on Days 3 to 21. Single doses of dabigatran etexilate administered orally on Days 16 and 20 during the lanabecestat dosing.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Overtly healthy males and females
Exclusion Criteria:
- Eye abnormalities or disease
- History of vitiligo or any skin color disorder
- Have a history psychiatric or brain disease including seizures
- Have smoked within the last 3 months
- Are unwilling to avoid food and drinks containing grapefruit or Seville oranges for the duration of the study
- Have known allergies to dabigatran etexilate and related compounds
